title: Queue Dodge Penalty for not being able to ban
body: My Client was working fine, no fps or lag issues, got into a solo/duo game and it wouldn't let me select ANY champ to ban, I could search them, I could click the icon, but the ban button would just flash around the edge and not light up to confirm, resulting in a queue dodge penalty of 5 minutes and some seconds, this is about the 4th similar problem since season 7 rolled out and I had no problems before.

replies.body: Player support isn't able make adjustments to game stats or lower priority queues, but we can try to help resolve whatever is causing it to happen.  Contact our tech team through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you individually.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and attach it to the ticket.  This will give us some more context to find out what's changed.  Hopefully we can get this fixed and get you back in-game.
